Name: campylobacteriosis
Definition: A primary bacterial infectious disease that results_in infection located_in intestine

Name: obsolete staphylococcal enterocolitis
Definition: A staphylococcal infectious disease that involves infection of the intestine caused by staphylococci

Name: eosinophilic gastroenteritis
Definition: A gastrointestinal system disease that is located_in the mouth.
